briefTitle: Health-promoting Lifestyle in a Genetic Counseling Clinic
officialTitle: Health-promoting Lifestyle of Breast Cancer Patients and Family Members in a Chinese Genetic Counseling Clinic: A Cross-sectional Study
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* over 18 years old;
* with a diagnosis of breast cancer or having a family history of breast cancer
* the first time to take genetic testing in our clinic
* ECOG\<2.

Exclusion Criteria:

* diagnosed with psychiatric or intellectual impairment
* having a history of genetic testing previously
